channel.title: Ckad on Book of Daniel

item.title: Passing CKAD After Your CKA
item.description:
A lot of Reddit users say that CKAD is easier than CKA. Personally, I agree‚Äîit does feel lighter if you attempt CKAD after completing CKA. The CKAD focuses more on scheduling tasks, while CKA involves administration of clusters. So, in CKAD, it’s more about speed and being quick with your typing to finish all the questions in time. üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüïí

My Study Approach

After passing the CKA two weeks earlier, I had a pretty good idea of what the exam interface and questions would be like. I compared the CKA and CKAD certifications to see what additional topics I needed to cover for CKAD.
